thread.title: 'Bajrangi Bhaijaan' Salman Khan's message to real-life Munni will melt your heart
thread.title_full: 'Bajrangi Bhaijaan' Salman Khan's message to real-life Munni will melt your heart | Latest News & Updates at Daily News & Analysis

author: dna webdesk
title: 'Bajrangi Bhaijaan' Salman Khan's message to real-life Munni will melt your heart
text:
File Photo On Monday, Bajrangi Bhaijaan Salman Khan took to Twitter to welcome Geeta to India. Quote: : “Two countries have worked together to reunite a girl with her family . The power of love . Welcome home Geeta.” Geeta's story came to light after the release of Salman Khan starrer "Bajrangi Bhaijaan" in which the hero unites a girl separated from her Pakistani mother who was visiting India.
Two countries have worked together to reunite a girl with her family . The power of love . Welcome home Geeta .
— Salman Khan (@BeingSalmanKhan) October 26, 2015
Mahato claimed Geeta is his first child and her name was Heera who was lost in a fair in 2004. Heaping praise on Bilquis, Swaraj said all the members of the organisation who accompanied Geeta have been accorded state guest status. The Edhi delegation is likely to visit Taj Mahal, Ajmer Sharif dargah as well as various historical places in Delhi. Giving a detail account of her stay in Edhi Foundation, Bilquis on her part said, "I am extremely happy. Today is like Eid for me. I am happy for Geeta." She said Geeta initially was restless and wanted to flee from Pakistan. (Read: How Salman Khan's Bajrangi Bhaijaan inspired a real-life miracle )
Bilquis said Geeta watched "Bajrangi Bhaijan" several times. "She had said the movie has been made taking my story but I have not been taken back," said Bilquis quoting Geeta.
Witn inputs from agencies
